name: Basil Cento Rear Centre Basket
description: This elegant basket bolts to the top of your rear rack. On weekdays, let it take the weight of your pack off your back. On weekends, load it with snacks and ride to your favourite picnic spot.Made of painted steel mesh with a strengthened frame.Fixed mounting to rear rack with included hardware.Cutout for seat clearance.Dimensions are 30 x 51 x 20cm.
